title: ISic002937. I.Sicily inscription 002937
body:
Facsimile Images

1..[..........?]
2ΠΙΣΤΩΝΟΣ[....]...Δ[....---]
3ΤΟΥΕΥΞΙΟΣΖΩΙΛΟΥΤΟ[.---]
4ΝΕΑΝΙΣΚΟΙΛΑΜΠΑΔΙ[.]Τ[..---]

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of Manganaro 1999

translation

commentary

One of two inscriptions on this upright stone, broken in its upper right area. The other inscription, on the front face upper left is ISic001412. Cf. IG XIV.369-71 for other evidence of gymnasion in Haluntium. The text of Manganaro is ambitious and requires revision in light of fresh autopsy

bibliography

  • 49.1270 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • 26.1060 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796

  • Moretti 1976 182 n.2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001736
  • Cordiano 1997 43-45 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002064
  • Manganaro 1999 65 no.54 fig.136 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001813
